Recommendations: 1. A Manual of Nursing Procedures, for use of both faculty and students, should be produced
2. Clinical teaching plans have to be signed by the team who prepared them, their immediate supervisor and the Dean.
3. The course syllabus should contain the placement of subject/concept during the school year, the proposed venue(s) where the RLE component will be conducted, and the date it was revised/updated.
4. The faculty should try and develop instructional materials of their own.
5. A state-of-the-art amphitheater-type Nursing Skills Laboratory needs to be provided, taking into consideration the adequacy of space and equipment such as trays, beds, dolls, etc.
